data.title: home
data.meta_description: Check showtimes and buy tickets at your local cinema
data.text:
There are a number of signature amenities that visitors will enjoy at our latest location, Warehouse Cinemas - Rotunda in Baltimore, Maryland. Our latest movie theater is going to feature seven screens, four of which are 4K projectors, and all auditoriums will feature Dolby 7.1 surround sound. The renovations will also include the installation of new, heated leather recliners, a self-serve beer wall, expanded menu and a premium bar with wine and movie-themed cocktails.

Like our other locations, Warehouse Cinemas â€“ Rotunda will feature a fast-casual restaurant and bar model. Instead of having food ordered and brought to the seat, our guests will have the opportunity to purchase food and traditional concessions in the lobby and take into the auditoriums. Guests will be given an optional pager to notify them when their food is ready. The average wait time in other Warehouse Cinemas locations is under 6 minutes. As always, our Warehouse Cinemas offers unlimited free refills on all sizes of soda and popcorn. Furthermore, guests are invited to come in and enjoy the food and beverage menu at the restaurant regardless if you're staying to watch a movie.

For job openings, visit https://warehousecinemas.com/careers.

For on-screen advertising opportunities, visit https://warehousecinemas.com/advertising.

Warehouse Cinemas - Rotunda wants to connect local businesses and organizations in and around Hampden. We can connect you to local moviegoers: Whether you're newly established or a Maryland staple, we want you to gain exposure through our unique advertising options.

Join our email newsletter for updates on construction for an official open date:
